==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|お|たか|k2=だか|かた|k3=がた|r=y|yomi=k}}

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|おだかがた|acc=h|y=k}}

===Etymology===
From ''o'' ([[尾]], [[tail]]) + ''taka'' ([[高]], [[high]]) + ''kata'' ([[型]], [[type]])

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|おだかがた}}
# The accent pattern in Japanese in which the last syllable of the word is accented when followed by certain particles.
